00001 #include <iostream>
00002 #include <cstdlib>
00003 #include <string>
00004 #include <string.h>
00005 #include <sys/types.h>
00006 #include <sys/socket.h>
00007 #include <netinet/in.h>
00008 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00009 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00010 #include "Error.hpp"
00011 #include "Socket.hpp"
00012 
00013 static int send( int sock, int nb )
00014 {
00015    static char buf[1024];
00016    if ( nb > 1024 ) nb=1024; 
00017    std::cout << "sending: " << nb << "\n";     
00018    return send( sock, buf, nb, 0 );
00019 }
00020 
00021 static int recv( int sock )
00022 {
00023    uint32_t msg = 0;
00024    SysErrIf( recv( sock, &msg, sizeof(msg), 0 ) == -1 );
00025    msg = ntohl(msg); 
00026    std::cout << "recv: " << msg << "\n";
00027    return msg;
00028 }
00029 
00030 
00038 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00039 {
00040    std::string USAGE("Usage: testCli <server ip addr> <server port> [N pings=10]\n");
00041    ErrIf( argc < 3 ).info(USAGE);
00042 
00043    //** Get the server address, port and maxPings arguments
00044    std::string serverIP( argv[1] );
00045    
00046    in_port_t port;
00047    ErrIfCatch(boost::bad_lexical_cast,
00048               port = boost::lexical_cast<in_port_t>( argv[2] ))
00049              .info("%s is not a port number!\n",argv[2]);
00050    
00051    // Put the supplied ip addr into the sockaddr_in struct
00052    sockaddr_in svAddr;
00053    memset( &svAddr, 0, sizeof(svAddr) );
00054    ErrIf( inet_pton(AF_INET, serverIP.c_str(), &svAddr ) != 1 )
00055         .info("Unable to convert '%s' to an AF_INET address\n",serverIP.c_str());
00056    
00057    svAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;     
00058    svAddr.sin_port = htons(port);
00059    
00060    // Get the last (optional) argument which is the number of times to send to the
00061    // server. Default to 10.
00062    int maxPings = 10;
00063    if ( argc > 3 ) {
00064       ErrIfCatch( boost::bad_lexical_cast,
00065                   maxPings=boost::lexical_cast<int>(argv[3]))
00066                .info("Couldn't convert num of pings arg: '%s' to an int\n", argv[3]);
00067    }
00068 
00069 
00070    
00071    //** Connect to the server
00072    Socket sock;
00073    SysErrIf( (sock=socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == -1 );
00074    SysErrIf( connect(sock, reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&svAddr), sizeof(svAddr)) == -1 );
00075    
00076    //** Send maxPing messages to the server, each progressively longer then the last
00077    const int MAX_RETRY = 3;
00078    int pingCnt = 0;
00079    while( pingCnt < maxPings ) {
00080       
00081       int snb=0;
00082       int rnb=0;
00083       int resend = 0;
00084       do {
00085          SysErrIf( (snb = send( sock, 1<<pingCnt )) == -1 );
00086          SysErrIf( (rnb = recv( sock )) == -1 );
00087       } while( resend++ < MAX_RETRY && rnb != snb );
00088       ErrIf( resend == MAX_RETRY )
00089          .info("Unable to checksum last packet, %d sent != %d recv\n",snb,rnb);
00090          
00091       ++pingCnt; 
00092    }
00093    
00094    return 0;
00095 }
